title: So OCE is literally the worst server in the world.
body:
Oce is so trash, also why was Carbon sent all his interviews are near autistic and he's garbage, and why is chuchuz there and not swiffer? I didn't follow the voting because I don't really care, but I was expecting swiffer 100%, Carbon didn't surprise me for some reason people like him I have no clue, he's probably one the least entertaining most boring people I've ever seen in the league 'pro' scene or just in general. (he's also bad) 

R.I.P Oce.

Oh my, and Destiny as sub, this server is beyond redemption.

replies.body:
All star teams can only have 2 players maximum from the same club. And Raydere+Egym were so popular that the other chiefs missed out. This lead to a trickle down effect for the top lane, because the next two popular players were ChuChuz and Carbon in their positions, so no more Legacy players could be on the team. Ryoo got a few votes and out of the rest of the players (not Chiefs or Legacy), was the most popular top lane pick, so he made it into the squad.

I wouldn't say that OCE is trash, we just have a lot of drafting and middlegame strategies to work on. They tried to make Kog'Maw work but their team composition was just out of whack. Like Spawn said, in one of the games they should have given the flex pick Ryze to Ryoo, and picked a Lulu for ChuChuz to make that composition work. 

Carbon was perhaps trying too hard, I dunno, he made some bad plays, but it happens. Raydere wasn't so impressive in the last game against Turkey, he was constantly taking poke from the Miss Fortune. Thought Ryoo, EGym and ChuChuz had a reasonable series.

I think I picked Minkywhale (top), Spookz (Jungle), Swiffer (Mid), Cardrid (ADC), and Nada (support) as my choices, but EGym and Raydere just had way too much of the vote, for any of those to make it into the team.

The Japanese are rich.

Educate yourself on peoples cultures before you talk please.

Watching SKT at worlds was demoralizing. They've been nerds for a lot longer than we have - as a society and growing with it and having it around them puts them at an insane advantage (China etc) - they were paying 10$ for t1 1MB/s internet when we were paying 600$.

America are a corporate giant and they themselves got destroyed because of this. It might have taken a while for it to present itself but when they formed the company and had all the love in the world in America, it's no surprise they won at some point. But still Azubu smashed them etc.

Looking at the competing countries, a lot of them are demoralized because of the cultural and technical disadvantages and there are plenty of real world problems.

Australia is a spoilt country now but they haven't been for very long and there are a lot of people striving for greatness around the world and a lot of people that are on a similar level and when these teams meet they clash hard and fast and it is all over and will often be a landslide game after game after game.

There's too much involved to really discuss but can you just please stop trashtalking OCE.

You're not trashtalking famous people or our Champions, you're trash-talking the underdogs and it's almost as filth as the Internation Wildcards Allstars Chat was when I took a peek. Think about these people before you start talking them down. Take a look at the trash on Twitch chat before you join them because they are the scum of the Universe and it is an embarrassment for the human race and what youre saying is bordering on being similar to them and their twisted messed up attitudes. Reality. Please. Learn it.

Triggered.

A lot of what you said didn't make much sense. 

I am fully aware of Australia's internet situation. I am also aware that basically 98% of Australia shuns the idea of someone gaming for a living, or even for fun in a lot of cases.

But that doesn't change that Oceania based on results, is arguably the worst server in the world, and that was what the thread was made for, not to discuss socioeconomic affects on the skill lvl of oce

Triggered? Leaving this thread.
So triggered. Maybe if we didn't say this trash tier Carbon and Chuchuz we'd have a better shot but yea, triggered.

Cool story bro.

I agree oce server is okay. IT'S JUST the community within oce on the server that's so butthurt that they always like to curse and all, complaining about trash that literally can be solved with a click of a button. It's just the people in the game that throw me off. As for the teams I haven't been following that.

Japan server is like not even a year old lmeo, we are just trash. (I can't tell if you're trolling/sarcastic) if you were taking a shot at all the plebs that say "OCE JUST NEEDS TIME" then well played.

Or it's a stab at NA, Dyrone brain wash oce to all feed? There is just so many ways to take your vague response gg.

Wow that delete GG.
excuse me he is 12 get it right he might get more salty. But I hit the block button so I can't see his crap anyway.

japan doesn't have a server lmao.
they have a team that's better than us, but they don't even have their own server.
At lest Carbon got a chance to go in an event like this. Don't see you in any popular events...

Btw I'm assuming we beat brazil because they were pubstomping and literally just let their guard down yolo diving and then all the kills and shutdowns happened to go straight onto Kalista plus the scaling ryze and kass, silly Brazil huehue. But yea I'd highly doubt Brazil would let that happen again.
